course.title: Urban Futures
course.description: This course embraces a variety of source materials - including the city of Boston itself - in order to study the relationship between the everyday spaces of the urban environment and the structures of the global economy. Using an interdisciplinary approach, we will focus particularly on the historical development of the city in a global context, giving special attention to themes of urban modernity, political ecology, and social justice. Assignments for the course will include collaborative postings to a course blog, as well as a final research paper.
